thread.title: Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections
thread.title_full: Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections

title: Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections
text:
Puli (U): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
After collecting 64 Crores (approx) from its opening weekend, the high budget flick has managed to amass a tad above 10 Crore rupees on the first three days of its second week. 
According to a report, Puli has grossed a total of 4.5 Crores from the whole of Tamil Nadu in its second week so far. In Kerala, the Vijay starrer has gathered just 1.13 Crore rupees. 
The box office figures from Karnataka too puts forward a similar story as the fantasy film has collected 1.15 Crores from Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday combined. 
When it comes to Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, Puli has collected a total of 1.3 Crores from the weekdays. From rest of India, the collections stand at 1 Crore rupees (approx). 
From overseas, Puli has so far amassed 2 Crore rupees from its second week with France contributing handsomely. The total collections from France now stands at â‚¬120,661 which approximately amounts to 88 Lakh rupees. 
Though the film attracted negative reviews from most of the critics, it is being aggressively supported by films stars including Superstar Rajinikanth. 
Check out the slides below to know who else have extended their hands of support to Puli : Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 1/8 Tamannaah 
The Baahubali girl said that the grandiose at which the entire film has been shot simply blew her away while watching Puli on the big screen. Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 2/8 Samuthirakani 
Actor-director Samuthirakani has said that Puli is a film that aims to entertain kids and that children would adore Puli . He has also congratulated Ilayathalapathy Vijay for taking up such a film. Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 3/8 T Rajendar 
T.R has lashed out at critics for writing negative reviews on Puli . He has said some people have spread false news about the movie and that they do not know how to appreciate a film. Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 4/8 Samantha 
Samantha has said Puli did achieve in taking her to a different world and that she enjoyed the visual effects and all the imposing edifices shown in the film. Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 5/8 D Imman 
Music director Imman congratulated the entire team of Puli for attempting such a film, for fantasy flicks are a rarity in Tamil cinema. He also said that there aren't many films that aims to entertain kids and family audience. Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 6/8 'Jayam' Ravi 
'Jayam' Ravi hailed the visual effects of the film and has urged everyone to watch the film in theatres as he believes that such films should be welcomed by all. Puli Collects 75 Crores: Worldwide Weekday (Monday, Tuesday & Wednesday) Box Office Collections 7/8 Jiiva 
Jiiva has said that the film is a jolly ride which takes us into a different world. He has praised Vijay for his brave attempt and has expressed his wish to engage in such films in the future. You might like
